About Me

Building reliable, scalable infrastructure solutions

I'm a passionate DevOps Engineer and Site Reliability Engineer with over 3.5 years of hands-on experience in designing, implementing, and optimizing cloud infrastructure. My expertise spans across major cloud platforms including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

I specialize in automating deployments, managing containerized applications with Kubernetes and Docker, and utilizing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform and Ansible. My goal is to drive efficient, scalable, and secure cloud solutions that contribute to organizational success.

My journey in DevOps and Site Reliability Engineering

Infrastructure Engineer

Adobe

San Jose, CA

May 2025 – June 2025
  • Provisioned AWS resources using AWS Controllers for Kubernetes (ACK) and Helm templates to standardize and automate deployment of AWS resources within Adobe's cloud-native ecosystem
  • Implemented observability stack using Prometheus, Grafana, and YACE exporters, enabling high-availability metrics ingestion and granular monitoring across namespaces
  • Automated infrastructure deployment workflows, reducing manual intervention by 60% and improving deployment consistency across multi-cluster Kubernetes environments

Sep 2024 – Mar 2025
